Container.Name: tachidesk
Container.Overview:
This Template just makes the official Tachidesk Docker Image easily usable for Unraid. For more Information see the Project Page.
A free and open source manga reader that runs extensions built for Tachiyomi. Tachidesk is an independent Tachiyomi compatible software and is not a Fork of Tachiyomi. Tachidesk is as multi-platform as you can get. Any platform that runs java and/or has a modern browser can run it. This includes Windows, Linux, macOS, chrome OS, etc. Follow Downloading and Running the app for installation instructions. Ability to read and write Tachiyomi compatible backups and syncing is a planned feature.

Config.Name: Manga Library
Config.Description: Path where Mangas are stored. If none is given, they will be downloaded into the Appdata Folder
